description: Break down useBudgetComposites.ts (827 LOC) into smaller, cohesive modules under 300 LOC each

workstreams.description: Analyze file structure and identify logical groupings
Create useBudgetTransactionComposites.ts with transaction management hooks
Create useBudgetAnalyticsComposites.ts with dashboard and analytics hooks
Create index.ts for backward compatibility re-exports

decisions.decision: Split into 5 files: workflow (215 LOC), planning (87 LOC), transaction (67 LOC), analytics (161 LOC), comparison (81 LOC), plus index
